title: Obama to Georgia Democrats: ‘Resist the Temptation to Give Up’
description: The former president is hitting the campaign trail, beginning in Georgia on Friday night, to try to help Democrats energize voters and regain momentum in key Senate races.
dc:creator: Maya King and Jonathan Weisman

media:content.media:credit: Gabriela Bhaskar for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Former President Barack Obama campaigned for Democratic candidates in Georgia on Friday night in Atlanta, saying “I’m here to tell you that tuning out is not an option.”
